tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE data_security (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    data VARCHAR(255),
    security_level VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE data_audit (
    audit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    table_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    audit_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    details JSON NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE big_data_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    password_hash TEXT,
    date_registered TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE data_access_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    access_time TIMESTAMP,
    accessed_table VARCHAR(50),
    access_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE data_compliance_checks (
    check_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    check_type VARCHAR(50),
    check_description TEXT,
    check_result BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE data_security_audit_logs (
    audit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    audit_time TIMESTAMP,
    action_performed VARCHAR(100),
    audit_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE data_privacy_policies (
    policy_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(50),
    policy_details TEXT,
    creation_date DATE,
    last_updated TIMESTAMPTZ
);
